title: Throw Icicle
data:
{{version030}} {{flavour|Fires a shard of ice. Due to its strong impact and cutting edges, a significant portion of its damage bypasses cold resistance.}} '''Throw Icicle''' is a level 4 [[Conjurations]]/[[Ice Magic]] monster-only spell which hurls an icy shard at a single target up to 5 tiles away. Only 50% of its damage is reduced by [[cold resistance]], making it effective even against players with significant protection from [[cold]] damage. Because Throw Icicle is a solid projectile, it can pass through [[cloud]]s of flame without negating them. {{monsters with spell}} ==History== {{Spell |name=Throw Icicle |level=4 |school1={{Conjurations}} |school2={{Ice Magic}} |school3= |castingnoise=4 |spellnoise=4 |sources=
*[[Book of Frost]]
}} {{AttackSpell |name=Throw Icicle |formula = 3d(3.33+Power/6) [[cold]] |maxdmg = 3d20 |maxsp = 100 |range = 6 |target = Beam |tohit = 9+Power/12 |special = Partially irresistible |hit_type = normal |hit_adder = 9 |hit_num = 1 |hit_denom = 12 |dam_calculator = calcdice |dam_numdice = 3 |dam_adder = 10 |dam_num = 1 |dam_denom = 2}} *Prior to [[0.30]], Throw Icicle was 40% resistible. *In [[0.25]], Throw Icicle was removed from the list of spells available to players in favor of [[Hailstorm]]. *In an early version of ''Crawl'', Throw Icicle was known as '''Ice Bolt'''. The name was changed to avoid confusion with the other [[Bolt spells]]. [[Category:Monster spells]]
